channel.title: Pages on Wise
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Wise
channel.item:
Contacthttps://wiseweb-works.github.io/blog/en/page/iletisim/Wed, 01 Dec 2021 23:58:00 +0100https://wiseweb-works.github.io/blog/en/page/iletisim/Welcome to my web page where I write some of my projects with my concerns about privacy, security and internet in today’s world. This web page has been created for the purpose of both creating my personal portfolio and sharing information. ​ ​ If there is a topic that interests you in what I have written, I welcome your ideas and of course your Github pull requests. If you want to contact me:

Welcome to my web page where I write some of my projects with my concerns about privacy, security and internet in today’s world. This web page has been created for the purpose of both creating my personal portfolio and sharing information. ​ ​ If there is a topic that interests you in what I have written, I welcome your ideas and of course your Github pull requests.

If you want to contact me:

email wisewebworks[at]outlook.com
mastodon fosstodon.org/@wise
xmpp wise[at]yax.im

My Blog supports RSS. If you wish, you can register via the RSS reader you are using.

Thank you dear Ged 1 for inspiring me to create a web page that is not unnecessarily large, does not bother users with additional components and a long load time. This club supports the internet and protecting users from unnecessarily large sites.

This site was created using Hugo and with the theme PaperMod. Also, this site is a Green Member of 512kbClub with its size below 100kb.

512kbClub

  1. https://yunbere.hayalmasal.org/ ↩︎
